tournament.title: Torneio
tournament.rules_explanation: Neste modo, o objetivo √© vencer duelos (melhor de 3), n√£o avan√ßar no tabuleiro. As cartas Sobe, Desce e Pula t√™m efeitos √∫nicos!
tournament.rule_sobe: Sobe: Soma +5 pontos ao seu resultado final na rodada.
tournament.rule_desce: Desce: Subtrai -5 pontos do seu resultado final na rodada.
tournament.rule_pula: Pula: Rouba o efeito 'Sobe' ou 'Desce' ativo de um oponente e o aplica a si mesmo.
tournament.description_online: Entre na fila para um torneio de 8 jogadores e dispute pela premia√ß√£o em CoinVersus!
tournament.description_offline: Jogue um torneio completo contra 7 oponentes controlados pelo computador a qualquer momento.

buffs.immunity_negative_desc: Nesta rodada, voc√™ fica imune aos efeitos 'Menos' e 'Desce'.
buffs.reveal_opponent_hand_desc: Nesta rodada, a m√£o do seu oponente ficar√° vis√≠vel para voc√™.
buffs.immunity_defeat_desc: Imunidade √† derrota. Se voc√™ perder esta rodada, ainda assim avan√ßar√° para o pr√≥ximo oponente.
buffs.auto_win_desc: Pule o pr√≥ximo oponente e avance diretamente para a pr√≥xima escolha de b√¥nus.

buffs.rei_reversum_card_desc: Troque uma de suas cartas de efeito por uma carta 'Reversus Total'.
buffs.sobe_resto_boost_desc: Ao jogar 'Sobe' em si mesmo, seu 'Resto' aumenta em +1 para o c√°lculo da pontua√ß√£o desta rodada.

buffs.pula_draw_effect_desc: Ao jogar 'Pula' em si mesmo, compre uma nova carta de efeito.

info.objective_text: Ser o primeiro jogador (ou dupla) a levar seu pe√£o at√© a casa 10 do tabuleiro.
info.turn_text: No seu turno, voc√™ pode jogar cartas de efeito livremente e deve seguir a regra abaixo para cartas de valor. Depois, passe o turno.
info.value_card_rule_1: Se voc√™ tiver 2 ou mais cartas de valor na m√£o, voc√™ DEVE jogar exatamente uma por turno.
info.value_card_rule_2: Se voc√™ tiver apenas 1 carta de valor, voc√™ N√ÉO PODE jog√°-la. Ela ficar√° bloqueada para ser usada como "Resto".
info.value_card_rule_3: A carta de valor jogada se torna seu novo "Resto" para a pr√≥xima rodada.
info.end_of_round_text: A rodada termina quando todos os jogadores passam o turno consecutivamente. A pontua√ß√£o √© calculada e os pe√µes se movem.
info.end_of_round_rule_1: Vencedor(es): Avan√ßam 1 casa. Em caso de empate, ningu√©m avan√ßa.
info.end_of_round_rule_2: Efeitos 'Sobe'/'Desce': Movem seu pe√£o para cima ou para baixo.
info.end_of_round_rule_3: Efeitos 'Mais'/'Menos': Somam ou subtraem o valor do seu "Resto" da sua pontua√ß√£o.
info.special_card_pula: Pula: For√ßa um oponente a mover seu pe√£o para um caminho vazio no tabuleiro.
info.special_card_reversus: Reversus: Inverte um efeito ('Mais' vira 'Menos', 'Sobe' vira 'Desce', etc.) em um √∫nico jogador.
info.special_card_reversus_total: Reversus Total: A carta mais poderosa. Inverte TODOS os efeitos em TODOS os jogadores na rodada (efeito Global). Pode tamb√©m ser usada para aplicar e travar um efeito b√°sico ('Mais', 'Menos', etc.) em um √∫nico alvo por uma rodada (efeito Individual).
info.field_effects_text: Parar em casas coloridas no tabuleiro ativa efeitos especiais que duram a rodada inteira!
info.credits_line_1: O jogo "Reversus" foi criado por Xael em 2023 com o tema "Corrida para o Altar" em forma de Card Game + Tabuleiro, para recolher fundos para o seu casamento - e agora estamos na vers√£o 4.0 (25/09/2025) com muitas novidades!
info.credits_line_2: Aproveite todos os modos e funcionalidades:
info.credits_line_3: E em breve: vers√£o para mobile! o/
info.credits_line_4: Meus agradecimentos especiais a todos os que apoiaram este projeto desde o in√≠cio.
info.conduct_title: Regras de Conduta e Motivos para Banimento
info.conduct_intro: O usu√°rio concorda em n√£o praticar as seguintes a√ß√µes dentro do jogo, sob pena de suspens√£o ou banimento permanente da conta:
info.conduct_item1_text: Uso de palavr√µes, ofensas, amea√ßas, ass√©dio ou qualquer tipo de discrimina√ß√£o (ra√ßa, g√™nero, religi√£o, orienta√ß√£o sexual etc.).
info.conduct_item2_text: Atos que causem desconforto a outros jogadores, incluindo persegui√ß√£o, mensagens insistentes ou comportamento abusivo.
info.conduct_item3_text: Tentativa de fraude, estelionato, lavagem de dinheiro, compartilhamento de informa√ß√µes ilegais ou links maliciosos.
info.conduct_item4_text: Uso de hacks, cheats, bots, macros ou qualquer recurso que d√™ vantagem injusta sobre outros jogadores.
info.conduct_item5_text: Envio massivo de mensagens, propagandas, links externos ou qualquer tipo de marketing n√£o autorizado no jogo.
info.conduct_item6_text: Comercializa√ß√£o, empr√©stimo ou compartilhamento da conta com terceiros sem autoriza√ß√£o oficial.
info.conduct_item7_title: Uso de linguagem inapropriada no chat e canais oficiais:
info.conduct_item7_text: Incluindo qualquer conte√∫do sexual expl√≠cito, gore, incita√ß√£o ao √≥dio ou discurso violento.
info.privacy_intro: Ao utilizar o jogo, o usu√°rio declara estar ciente e de acordo com os seguintes pontos:
info.privacy_item1_text1: O jogo poder√° coletar informa√ß√µes como e-mail, nickname, logs de mensagens no chat e intera√ß√µes dentro do jogo.
info.privacy_item1_text2: Esses dados s√£o utilizados para garantir seguran√ßa, prevenir fraudes, aplicar as regras de conduta e melhorar a experi√™ncia do usu√°rio.
info.privacy_item2_title: Acesso a mensagens e comunica√ß√µes internas
info.privacy_item2_text1: A equipe do jogo poder√° acessar chats e e-mails internos quando houver den√∫ncia ou suspeita de viola√ß√£o das regras, sempre respeitando a LGPD.
info.privacy_item2_text2: Nenhuma comunica√ß√£o ser√° compartilhada com terceiros sem consentimento, exceto quando exigido por lei.
info.privacy_item3_text: O jogador pode solicitar a exclus√£o dos seus dados pessoais a qualquer momento, ciente de que isso pode resultar no encerramento definitivo da conta.
info.privacy_item4_text: Ao criar a conta e continuar usando o jogo, o usu√°rio concorda integralmente com estas regras e pol√≠ticas de privacidade.

ai_dialogue.necroverso_tutorial_winning_1: Voc√™ ainda tem muito a aprender...
ai_dialogue.contravox_winning_1: !arogA redreP riV o√£N E redreP acnuN ue
ai_dialogue.versatrix_losing_1: Voc√™ sabe que eu posso reverter o campo, n√©?
ai_dialogue.versatrix_losing_2: Eu pensei... que voc√™ fosse diferente... ser√° que me enganei?
ai_dialogue.reversum_winning_1: PENSEI QUE ISSO SERIA UM DESAFIO
ai_dialogue.narrador_winning_1: Eu estudei todos os seus movimentos...
ai_dialogue.narrador_winning_2: J√° fiz todos os c√°lculos para te derrotar em menos de 10 jogadas.
ai_dialogue.xael_losing_1: Hmm, interessante... mas n√£o ser√° o suficiente.
ai_dialogue.detetive_winning_1: Os fatos s√£o claros. Minha vit√≥ria √© inevit√°vel.
ai_dialogue.detetive_winning_2: Sua estrat√©gia √© transparente. Antecipei todos os seus movimentos.
ai_dialogue.detetive_losing_1: Interessante... uma anomalia nos dados. Devo reavaliar.
ai_dialogue.detetive_losing_2: Voc√™ √© um oponente mais astuto do que as evid√™ncias sugeriam.

story_dialogue.start_necroverso_text: Hello stranger... welcome! You are in the Inversus, and I am the Necroverso. If you wish to return to your world, you must challenge the rulers of this place...
story_dialogue.pre_tutorial_prompt_text: Yes, through a duel! They play a card and board game called REVERSUS. Would you like me to teach you the basics in a match?
story_dialogue.pre_tutorial_prompt_option_2: No, I'll figure it out myself.
story_dialogue.tutorial_skip_text: You must be a prodigy... Good luck then. Face the Contravox.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_1_text: Great. The main rule is: have the highest score at the end of the round to move forward on the board. Simple, right?
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_2_text: Your score is the sum of two VALUE cards you play. If you have 2 or more value cards, you MUST play one. If you only have one, it is saved for the next round, and your last card played will be your 'Rest'.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_3_text: EFFECT cards can change everything! 'More' and 'Less' use the value of your 'Rest' to increase or decrease your score. 'Up', 'Down' and 'Jump' move your pawn.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_4_text: The 'Reversus' and 'Reversus Total' cards are more complex and can turn the game around. You will learn their power in practice.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_5_text: Enough talk. Let's play. Don't think about winning, just learn the rules.
story_dialogue.tutorial_loss_text: It seems you're not ready yet. Remember, the goal is to learn. Let's try again.
story_dialogue.post_tutorial_text: And with that, we've finished the tutorial... I hope you've understood everything. Your first real challenge awaits.
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_intro_text: I'll tell you two secrets about the Contravox to help you in your duel...
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_text: Since I'm nice, I'll tell you... Contravox is the weakest of the three... and he has a special ability... be careful!
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_option_1: Was that supposed to be a secret?
story_dialogue.post_contravox_victory_text: Incredible... you really defeated Contravox?... alright... now only two remain, next is Versatrix, but be careful... not everything is as it seems.
story_dialogue.pre_versatrix_intro_text: Versatrix is a Gemini... and she is... valuable!
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_1: I feel like we've met in another life...
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_2: I don't want to lose... but if you defeat me... I'll still help you...
story_dialogue.versatrix_solteira_text: Well... you opportunist, let's just duel!
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_victory_option_1: When I defeat them... what happens?
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_defeat_text: Don't worry... I'll help you at the right time
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_defeat_option_1: I don't understand... did I lose?
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_ask_return_text:
You are getting closer to returning to your world...
Defeat King Reversum and I'll give you a chance to return to your world
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_text: Two valuable pieces of information... he is the most powerful and is immune to red!
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_option_1: Is this supposed to help me?
story_dialogue.start_reversum_text: I AM KING REVERSUM TOTEM! BOW BEFORE YOUR KING!
story_dialogue.start_reversum_option_2: I just want to finish the game...
story_dialogue.post_reversum_victory_text: Finally, with them defeated, Inversus is mine.
story_dialogue.final_confrontation_1_text: I didn't lie, I'll give you a chance to return... however, if you defeat me.
story_dialogue.necroverso_king_battle_intro_text: Hahaha! Thanks to you, I have total control over the kings you've defeated! And they will fight for me! But, to be fair, I'll explain the rules: in this battle, whoever has the lowest score in the round loses a heart. Lose them all... and you'll be eliminated forever!
story_dialogue.post_necroverso_king_victory_text: You... defeated me? Impossible! For now, you're free. But know that this is not the end. I will return...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_1_text: Wait! Before facing him, know that he can't be defeated just by reaching the center of the board first... and don't let his darkness touch you...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_1_option_2: I don't know what to do...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_2_text: I'll help you... together we'll win!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_text: Two more tips for you... your time is up and there's no escape!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_option_1: That didn't seem like a tip...
story_dialogue.xael_challenge_intro_text: So you accept my challenge! The rules here are different. The goal is to reach space 10 with MORE stars than me. Collect them on the board and use their effects wisely. Ready?
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_1: We did it! You defeated him!
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_3: Even if you defeat me... Inversus... will never cease to exist.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_4: And with time... a new Necroverso will arise.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_5: He‚Äôs gone... for now. You saved us. Thank you.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_6: I think it‚Äôs time for you to go home, right? Or... if you want, you can stay... The choice is yours.

event_abilities.january_new: Can make a red path appear in front of them at the start of each round (50% chance).
event_abilities.february_new: Swaps 'Rest' cards with the opponent at the start of each round, if favorable.
event_abilities.march_new: At the start of their turn, draws 2 value cards and discards 2, prioritizing keeping the highest values.
event_abilities.april_new: Once per turn, can ignore a negative effect played against them.
event_abilities.may_new: Plays their value and effect cards face down, revealing them only at the end of the round.
event_abilities.june_new: Can reuse one effect card that was used this round, once per round.
event_abilities.july_new: Has a 50% chance to steal a random card from your hand per round.
event_abilities.august_new: Can swap places on the board with the opponent once per match.
event_abilities.september_new: Once per round, can peek at and swap a card from your hand with one of their own.
event_abilities.october_new: Once per round (50% chance), can force everyone to discard the highest value card from their hands.
event_abilities.november_new: Once per round, can 'freeze' an opponent's effect card, preventing it from being played this round.
event_abilities.december_new: At the start of each round, they can swap hands with you (50% chance).

event.title: Monthly Event
event.description: Defeat the event opponent 3 times to earn an exclusive reward. You can only try once per day!
event.status_wait: You have already attempted the challenge today. Come back tomorrow!
event.status_completed: Challenge complete! Play again whenever you want this month.
event.victory_progress_message: You won! Event progress: {wins}/3. Come back tomorrow to continue.
event.victory_completed_message: Challenge complete! You unlocked the title: "{rewardName}"!
event.defeat_message: You were defeated. Come back tomorrow for a new attempt.
